quotes.quote: I want to say a very sincere thank you for this welcome home - it is a wonderful welcome home.
As they marched, the crowds lining the route broke into applause, a sweet and deeply felt spontaneous pattering that was a sort of communal embrace. Welcome home.
I'm always travelling and spend a lot of time in airports so I know what it feels like to get a personal welcome home. I wish I got more of them.
Welcome home, sweet girl, it will be all be fine.
I'll come get you, and I'll say: Welcome home.
Small cheer and great welcome makes a merry feast.
So, you are very welcome to our house. It must appear in other ways than words, Therefore, I scant this breathing courtesy.
Good company, good wine, good welcome, can make good people.
A table-full of welcome!
When we are generous in welcoming people and sharing something with them-some food, a place in our homes, our time-not only do we no longer remain poor: we are enriched.
Welcome, my old friend, Welcome to a foreign fireside.
Welcome home my dear, you are arrived.
And kind the voice and glad the eyes that welcome my return at night.
Welcome home to my native place bent upon returning bosom all day burning.
For each and all I bid thee a grateful welcome home.
And when the old man saw him come , well you know how we welcomed him,
To be welcomed by a hundred men each one has worn the leek.
In the lovely hotel alexandra I was welcomed with hugs and with smiles.
Though few understand it a life heaven loaned to be welcomed back home.
Kind voices bade him turn and rest and gentle faces welcomed him.
Where we love is home, home that our feet may leave, but not our hearts.

Our valleys may be filled with foes and tears; but we can lift our eyes to the hills to see God and the angels, heaven's spectators, who support us according to God's infinite wisdom as they prepare our welcome home.
Un-thread the rude eye of rebellion, and welcome home again discarded faith.
A smile is the universal welcome.
Like a welcome summer rain, humor may suddenly cleanse and cool the earth, the air and you.
So all they welcomed him and closed the door and gat them gladly.
To be welcomed and what an  experience is the flow of its air.
Once duly welcomed and adored how should I part with thee?
Every house was an inn where all were welcomed and feasted.
